meanings.definition: The exhaust pipe of a motor vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The tailpipes of the car were releasing smoke.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic fixed the tailpipes of the truck.
meanings.sent3: The tailpipes of the old car played a tune as the engine revved.
meanings.sent4: The tailpipes of the bus sang a noisy song as it drove away.
meanings.sent5: The tailpipes of the motorcycle roared like a lion as it sped down the road.

meanings.definition: A pipe at the rear of a vehicle through which exhaust gases are emitted.
meanings.sent1: The tailpipes of the van were rusty and needed replacement.
meanings.sent2: The tailpipes of the SUV were emitting black smoke.
meanings.sent3: The tailpipes of the car seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The tailpipes of the truck belched out fumes like a factory chimney.
meanings.sent5: The tailpipes of the car coughed and sputtered, struggling to start on a cold morning.
